sentences.sContent: ...a new two-year course leading to a diploma in social work.
sentences.sCn: ...一门可以获得社会工作文凭的2年制的新课程。

sentences.sContent: ...the extra time and money spent pursuing a college diploma will leave them worse off than they were before they set foot on campus...
...These graduates were told that a diploma was all they needed to succeed...

synos.tran: 毕业证书，学位证书；公文，文书；奖状

phrases.pCn: 大学文凭；（高等学校）文凭、毕业证书
研究生文凭；研究生文凭课程
[美口]文凭制造工厂；野鸡大学；不入流学校

words.tran: 经考试或审查合格的专科医生；学位证书持有者

trans.tranOther: a document showing that a student has successfully completed their  high school  or university education
